title: The Mustard Tree
tag: The Mustard Tree Foundation is a family of projects seeking to be a voice for the unheard. We strive to identify, support and empower the marginalised, misunderstood and overlooked in our community.

events.name: Become a sponsor
events.description: A Starting Point event for awareness.

events.name: Why locality is important
events.description: An Engage Befriending event for education.

events.name: Reading Half-Marathon
events.description: A Mustard Tree event for fundraising.

projects.name: Rahab
projects.description: ‘Restoring All Hope And Belief’: awareness, support & empowerment – tackling sexual exploitation.

projects.name: Lifeline
projects.description: Counselling for post-abortion, post-miscarriage & post-baby loss; crisis pregnancy advice & support.

projects.name: Starting Point
projects.description: 1-2-1 mentoring for 16-25 yr olds who are NEET.

projects.name: Engage Befriending
projects.description: Localised befriending for isolated, elderly people in the Reading area.

projects.name: Let's Grow
projects.description: A horticultural project for 16-25 yr olds who are NEET, improving work readiness.
